title: Front Fork - Inspection

body.body: Inspect the inner tube for stone chips, scoring, scratches, excessive wear and any other damage. Renew as necessary.
Small inclusions in the inner tube may be removed using a fine grade stone or similar.
Inspect the spring for damage, cracks and deformation. Renew the spring if necessary.
Inspect the seals for damage. Renew any damaged seals as necessary.
